title: AI-Enhanced Blended Learning Program for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Smartphone Usage Skills and Intermediate-Level Knowledge in Scientific Fields
context.additional_context: Hybrid class delivery combining offline discussions and online learning activities, operated in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose individual learning patterns and establish optimization strategies using AI analysis tools.
Learners improve their ability to utilize digital resources in a blended learning environment by more than 25%.
Learners enhance their scientific thinking skills by more than 30% through collaborative problem-solving activities.
Learners increase their academic achievement by more than 9 points through personalized feedback based on platform analysis.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
